com.geolud.atomica.ui.util.language

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geolud.atomica.ui.util.language.Language

  • public class Language
extends Object
    Providing texts of the ui in a required language. The mechanism is based on a ResourceBundles for each language. Implemented as singleton.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DE
      Constant for German language.
      static String EN
      Constant for English language.

      Returns the only instance of this class.

      Gets the current activated language.

      Returns a list of all currently supported languages.
      static String getString(String key)
      Gets a string for the given key from the resource bundle of the current language.
      void switchLanguage(String lang)
      Switches to the given language.
